task.title: Create Corpus
task.shortdesc: Create a new corpus in an existing project.

taskbody.prereq: First, a project must be open.

step.cmd: Choose the Project New Corpus... menu item.
step.stepresult: The New Corpus dialog will appear.

step.cmd: Enter a name (and optionally a description) for the new corpus. Click Ok.
step.stepresult: This creates a new corpus with the specified name inside the open project. An error message will appear if a corpus with that name already exists.You may return to edit the description at any time by clicking on the corpus name in the Project Manager and typing a description in the field below the Corpus list.
